title: Logistic Regression Calculator | Binary Classification & Odds

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: logit(p) = ln( p / (1 − p) ) = β₀ + β₁x₁ + β₂x₂ + … + βₖxₖ p = 1 / (1 + e^(−(β₀ + β₁x₁ + ... + βₖxₖ)))
